channel.title: COD W@W Zombies [Modded][[Xbox]]
channel.description:
Alright, I only play W@W zombies for modded zombies, because im that asshole :) Anyways, feel free to add me and I'll hook you up (NO PRESTIGE MODS!). These mods are for fun and getting some high ranks to piss your friends off. Add me if you wish, tell me you are from mopar, and a username would be helpful, then say you'd like to do W@W. Gamertag: [img]http://www.xboxgamertag.com/gamercard/D3V1LSN1GH7MAR3/arancia/card.png[/img]
D3V1LSN1GH7MAR3
Edit: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/5vxgfm.jpg[/img]
Just a pic from the game. Taken with my shitty phone. Round 29 with 144k or so points, and I am currently flying outside the map and edited the colors a lil bit :)
Best map to mod: Der Riese. Worst map to mod: Nacht Der Untoten Map I'm missing. The forresty one. Forgot the name xD

item.title: COD W@W Zombies [Modded][[Xbox]]
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

Yea, I liked WaW too, but I just find cod in general to be horrible now.

I prefer gta, lot’s more free roaming.

Read full topic

item.title: COD W@W Zombies [Modded][[Xbox]]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Pink Phat, post:14, topic:454697”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=557560.msg4082086#msg4082086 date=1345461174]

I actually had this the other day (only took 5 minutes with a tutorial) but my disc broke not long after.

You ISO modded your diskdrive? Or you just had the hack? lol
[/quote]
When I said disc I was referring to the WaW game disc :P. I modded it using a USB[/quote]

Ahh I see

I loved World at War in general, I used to be 33rd in the world on Headquarters, lol. Back before I got into private servers and programming and shit, it was easily the best call of duty.

Read full topic

item.title: COD W@W Zombies [Modded][[Xbox]]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:10, topic:454697”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=557560.msg4080978#msg4080978 date=1345372085]

I’ve always wanted a j-tag, but I’ve had the worst of luck on buying consoles that had mobo’s that can’t be j-tagged, and my slim needs to get a new cd drive, for like 80 bucks. I’d rather not spend it on my console to play iso disks. Nor would i go buy a j-tagged xbox for 200 over retail.

They’re not really all that special anymore. Back in mw2 they were, I could easily make 900$ profit on a night if I was hosting. Now you wouldnt break even after buying your key vault.
[/quote]
Now’s it’s the $80 disc drive replacement, and a RGH hack. They do essentially the same as a j-tag, but it isn’t. The RGH just makes the xbox boot without signed codes or something, so you could download a game off the internet and play it on your xbox. The disc drive just allows you to play iso’s[/quote]

You could do the disk drive yourself, there’s countless tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: COD W@W Zombies [Modded][[Xbox]]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:9, topic:454697”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=557560.msg4080652#msg4080652 date=1345332103]
I’ve always wanted a j-tag, but I’ve had the worst of luck on buying consoles that had mobo’s that can’t be j-tagged, and my slim needs to get a new cd drive, for like 80 bucks. I’d rather not spend it on my console to play iso disks. Nor would i go buy a j-tagged xbox for 200 over retail.
[/quote]

They’re not really all that special anymore. Back in mw2 they were, I could easily make 900$ profit on a night if I was hosting. Now you wouldnt break even after buying your key vault.[/quote]
Now’s it’s the $80 disc drive replacement, and a RGH hack. They do essentially the same as a j-tag, but it isn’t. The RGH just makes the xbox boot without signed codes or something, so you could download a game off the internet and play it on your xbox. The disc drive just allows you to play iso’s

Read full topic

They’re not really all that special anymore. Back in mw2 they were, I could easily make 900$ profit on a night if I was hosting. Now you wouldnt break even after buying your key vault.

item.title: COD W@W Zombies [Modded][[Xbox]]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:454697”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=557560.msg4080532#msg4080532 date=1345326419]
Like I said, I’ve not been around the Xbox modding and hacking scene for years, when I was around the USB sticks weren’t able to be used to mod any online activity on Xbox

I still have my jtag lying around somewhere, I haven’t booted it up in ages. Used to make serious bank off that back in the day.
[/quote]
Your j-tag won’t work if it’s that old. The dashboard has changed like 15 times. There is a way around it for j-tags but i wouldn’t know. Never had one.[/quote]

Meh, I don’t plan to use it again anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: COD W@W Zombies [Modded][[Xbox]]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:5, topic:454697”]Like I said, I’ve not been around the Xbox modding and hacking scene for years, when I was around the USB sticks weren’t able to be used to mod any online activity on Xbox

I still have my jtag lying around somewhere, I haven’t booted it up in ages. Used to make serious bank off that back in the day.[/quote]
Your j-tag won’t work if it’s that old. The dashboard has changed like 15 times. There is a way around it for j-tags but i wouldn’t know. Never had one.

Read full topic

item.title: COD W@W Zombies [Modded][[Xbox]]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:454697”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=557560.msg4079800#msg4079800 date=1345251361]
I love modding world at war
Seems you won’t get banned from xbox live, and it benefits you + the people around you… Unlike multiplayer which gives you an unfair advantage over the other players.

Is this USB or Jtag?
[/quote]
USB

I love modding world at war
Seems you won’t get banned from xbox live, and it benefits you + the people around you… Unlike multiplayer which gives you an unfair advantage over the other players.

Is this USB or Jtag?

Neither. I wouldn’t be wasting a key vault on doing zombies anyways. USB only works offline as far as I know.

I can’t remember what this method is called, but you more or less modify your disk tray if I remember correctly and run a new form of disk in it. You’d be better asking Tom for whatever method this is, I really can’t remember the name of it. It could be ISO modding or something along those lines.

Keep all of what I’ve said in mind that I’ve not been on the Xbox modding/hacking scene for around 2 years, lol.

Actually it’s usb modding. Online works on W@W zombies.
You are thinking of iso disk modding. Which requires hotswapping a disc while it’s installing, or buying a replica of the xbox CD drive, but has been modded to allow iso discs. You also need the iso file, and dual sided dvd’s or some shit. It’s not worth the money. When you can get a $20 usb stick (I have a lot around my room) and format it to the xbox, change a gamesave, and go.[/quote]

Like I said, I’ve not been around the Xbox modding and hacking scene for years, when I was around the USB sticks weren’t able to be used to mod any online activity on Xbox

I still have my jtag lying around somewhere, I haven’t booted it up in ages. Used to make serious bank off that back in the day.

Read full topic

item.title: COD W@W Zombies [Modded][[Xbox]]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:454697”]I love modding world at war
Seems you won’t get banned from xbox live, and it benefits you + the people around you… Unlike multiplayer which gives you an unfair advantage over the other players.

Is this USB or Jtag?[/quote]
USB

[quote=“Ruby, post:3, topic:454697”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=557560.msg4079800#msg4079800 date=1345251361]
I love modding world at war
Seems you won’t get banned from xbox live, and it benefits you + the people around you… Unlike multiplayer which gives you an unfair advantage over the other players.

Is this USB or Jtag?
[/quote]
Neither. I wouldn’t be wasting a key vault on doing zombies anyways. USB only works offline as far as I know.

I can’t remember what this method is called, but you more or less modify your disk tray if I remember correctly and run a new form of disk in it. You’d be better asking Tom for whatever method this is, I really can’t remember the name of it. It could be ISO modding or something along those lines.

Keep all of what I’ve said in mind that I’ve not been on the Xbox modding/hacking scene for around 2 years, lol.[/quote]
Actually it’s usb modding. Online works on W@W zombies.
You are thinking of iso disk modding. Which requires hotswapping a disc while it’s installing, or buying a replica of the xbox CD drive, but has been modded to allow iso discs. You also need the iso file, and dual sided dvd’s or some shit. It’s not worth the money. When you can get a $20 usb stick (I have a lot around my room) and format it to the xbox, change a gamesave, and go.

Read full topic
